Uses of Class
memoryClasses.Register

  • Packages that use Register 
    Package Description
    memoryClasses  
    p1MemorySystem  

    • Uses of Register in memoryClasses

      Methods in memoryClasses that return Register 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Register Memory.getOutput()
      Returns a copy of the current content of MODR
      Register Register.makeCopy()
      Returns a copy of the register.
      Methods in memoryClasses with parameters of type Register 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Register.copyRegisterToRegister(Register sReg, Register dReg)
      Copies a given register to another given register.
      void Memory.setInput(Register data)
      Copies the specified data to the memory's write register for future recording in memory (when the write operation is performed).

    • Uses of Register in p1MemorySystem

      Methods in p1MemorySystem that return Register 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Register P1MemSystem.readWord(int address)
      Returns the word from the given address.
      Methods in p1MemorySystem with parameters of type Register 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void P1MemSystem.writeWord(int address, Register regToWrite)
      Writes a given word to a given address.
